attributes.action: No to a Second Independence Referendum in Scotland
attributes.additional_details: In September 2014, 55.30% of the people of Scotland voted NO to Scotland becoming independent. In June of 2016, 51.89% of the U.K. population voted to leave the European Union. Based on these results, Nicola Sturgeon has deemed it necessary to hold another Independence Referendum in Scotland and we need to say no!
attributes.background: Nicola Sturgeon is pushing for another Independent Referendum in Scotland
